short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Developer tool that displays current UTC date and time for any selected city.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Compare Time - UTC is a versatile Chrome extension that allows users to select a continent and city to instantly view the current date and time in UTC. This feature is perfect for developers and users who need to compare the UTC time with the local time to validate the accuracy of their projects or simply to keep track of different time zones.

Features:
- Select Continent and City: Easily choose from a list of continents and cities to view the corresponding time.
- Instant UTC Time Display: The extension displays the current date and time in UTC for the selected location.
- Compare with Local Time: Quickly compare the UTC time with your local time to ensure your development aligns with expected time differences.
- User-Friendly Interface: A simple and intuitive interface makes it easy to navigate and find the information you need.

Perfect for developers, travelers, and anyone who needs to keep track of time across different regions, World Time Checker is your go-to tool for accurate and reliable time zone information.
